title: Security Badge Log
body: Badge swipes show entry at 9:12 PM and exit at 9:47 PM.

title: Incident Report Draft
body: A draft report mentions 'missing inventory' and an 'unsecured door.'

title: Email Thread: Procurement
body: A chain about expedited orders and a 'do not ask questions' note.

title: CCTV Still Frame
body: Blurry still shows a silhouette near storage at ~9:30 PM.

title: Interview: 'I was covering for someone'
body: Subject claims they stayed late to 'cover'â€”won't say for who.

title: Interview: 'Policy says keep the door propped'
body: Subject insists propping the door is 'standard practice.'
